title: No, Rahul Didn’t Say He Will Change the Sun’s Direction if Made PM
subtitle: Misleading social media posts circulating online claim Congress President Rahul Gandhi said that he will change the Sun’s direction if he becomes the prime minister.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
“I will not promise jobs for 2 crore youth. Like how Modiji says ‘I will move the moon from here to there… Make me PM and I will change the direction of the sun….' I will not make promises of that sort,” Gandhi can be heard saying around 8:37 mins into the video.

The clip that has been shared on social media with the false claim has clearly been chopped from the full video.

The doctored video has surfaced online ahead of Assembly elections in five states of the country.
